put.description: This will update primary cluster of existing universe.Use API to GET current universe. Lookup universeDetails attribute of the universe resource returned. Update the necessary field (e.g. numNodes) Use this updated universeDetails as request body. See https://github.com/yugabyte/yugabyte-db/blob/master/managed/api-examples/python-simple/edit-universe.ipynb
